content: That's right! <style=Highlight>{作物}</style>, and I happen to have some seeds here. {A笑眯眯}Would you like to try planting them?

content: It's <style=Highlight>{作物}</style>. Whenever I smell it in the wind, it reminds me of my galaxy.
info: NPC事件模板15-赠送种子-12绵朵_15-赠送种子

content: The fluffy, cloud-like morning dew and frost on top of deep green moss... It's as if they're right here with me.
